title: So what justifies Yasuo kit?
body: Just curious. It feels really overloaded on him, and also quite out of place. A wall that blocks projectiles seems better fit for a tank than someone like him.

replies.body:
It's overloaded because he has no form of invulnerability.  Tryndamere has hit ult and yi has his alpha strike to completely mitigate damage.  Fiora has her parry and spammable Q. 

Another thing to note is that these champions all have escapes as well, while yasuos only mobility is tied to minions, with a long ass cooldown on champions.  

If you want to remove his windwall make his ult do triple current damage and make him invulnerable, that's literally the kind of compensation you would have to give him.  

People are going to yell out delete yasuo, but if we deleted every champ in the game because people hated them, not even aatrox would still be a champion.

I'm shocked by the reasonable, correct answers.

Kudos to you, lads.

I think shyvana does too much damage given shes a tank, and talon's burst lacks counter play.. What justifies this?

TLDR: quit bitching, even you play shit people think is retarded.

p.s. i dont actually support my claims, just claims people have and i'm mimicing the OP's logic. (towards his 2 mains)

for the same reason why yi has untargebility, tryn has his ult and all other melee carries have 20 steroids to make them work: Otherwise they dont, they need it.
Yasuos defensive abilities are not even that great thats the reason why he has to play as pure assasin most of the time.

He's squishy as fuck & gets no mr/lvl.

And all "melee carries" get a defensive spell look at Yi, Fiora, GP, or Trynd.
